content.html: Hot take: I have knocked thousands of doors, and here are the generations ranked by friendliness. 1.) Millennials 2.) Boomers 3.) Silent/Greatest Generation … 100.) Gen X
content.value:
Hot take:

I have knocked thousands of doors, and here are the generations ranked by friendliness.

1.) Millennials
2.) Boomers
3.) Silent/Greatest Generation
…
100.) Gen X

name: Over the river & thru the wood

content.html: Gen X is tired. We know we need to vote, just quietly leave a pamphlet and let us alone. One of the nicest things about being a hermit whose driveway looks like nobody lives here is that no goddamned door knockers show up. No Mormons, no JWs, no political ones, nobody.
content.value:
Gen X is tired. We know we need to vote, just quietly leave a pamphlet and let us alone.

One of the nicest things about being a hermit whose driveway looks like nobody lives here is that no goddamned door knockers show up. No Mormons, no JWs, no political ones, nobody.
